title: file extraction
extract: How to open RAR filesSave the .rar file to the desktop. ... Launch WinZip from your start menu or Desktop shortcut. ... Select all the files and folders inside the compressed file. ... Click 1-click Unzip and choose Unzip to PC or Cloud in the WinZip toolbar under the Unzip/Share tab.More items...
extract_html:
How to open RAR files
  1. Save the .rar file to the desktop. ...
  2. Launch WinZip from your start menu or Desktop shortcut. ...
  3. Select all the files and folders inside the compressed file. ...
  4. Click 1-click Unzip and choose Unzip to PC or Cloud in the WinZip toolbar under the Unzip/Share tab.
More items...
